nodes.title: (184) Ka ca Monastery
nodes.body: The monastery is located 80 km northwest of the ’Bar khams Township, seat of the county. It is a very small establishment. Its only monk, Pad ma, was studying at rTogs ldan Monastery (No.178) in rNga khog as Ka ca is regarded as a branch of rTogs ldan, even though no one knows how and when the connection was established. When I visited the monastery 1998 there was only one elderly caretaker in the monastery. So far, no written records are available.
